20101214023634.500|20101214023637.000|CCO|FOR NOW, IT DOES TEE UP A 
20101214023637.000|20101214023639.500|CCO|MAMMOTH LEGAL BATTLE TO COME.

20101214023642.000|20101214023643.429|CCO|CLAIM MADE BY CONSERVATIVES AND

20101214023650.571|20101214023652.000|CCO|VIRGINIA, WHICH ARGUED THAT THE 
20101214023652.000|20101214023653.429|CCO|HEART OF THE LAW REQUIRING 
20101214023653.429|20101214023654.857|CCO|EVERYONE TO BUY INSURANCE WAS 
20101214023654.857|20101214023656.286|CCO|UNCONSTITUTIONAL.
20101214023656.286|20101214023657.714|CCO|>> THE RULE OF LAW MEANS 
20101214023657.714|20101214023659.143|CCO|SOMETHING.

20101214024613.667|20101214024615.333|CCO|STATES TO ADOPT A NO-REFUSAL 
20101214024615.333|20101214024617.000|CCO|POLICY.
20101214024617.000|20101214024618.667|CCO|THAT MEANS IF A DRIVER REFUSES A
20101214024618.667|20101214024620.333|CCO|BREATHALYZER TEST, POLICE NOTIFY
20101214024620.333|20101214024622.000|CCO|AN ON-CALL JUDGE WHO ISSUES AN 
20101214024622.000|20101214024624.000|CCO|IMMEDIATE SEARCH WARRANT FOR A 
20101214024624.000|20101214024626.000|CCO|NURSE TO TAKE A BLOOD SAMPLE AT 
20101214024626.000|20101214024628.000|CCO|A CHECKPOINT OR POLICE STATION.
20101214024628.000|20101214024630.000|CCO|IF THE BLOOD SAMPLE SHOWS THE 
20101214024630.000|20101214024632.000|CCO|BLOOD-ALCOHOL LEVEL ABOVE 0.08, 
20101214024632.000|20101214024633.667|CCO|THE DRIVER IS ARRESTED FOR DUI.
20101214024633.667|20101214024635.333|CCO|ARIZONA, FLORIDA, IDAHO, 
20101214024635.333|20101214024637.000|CCO|ILLINOIS, KANSAS, LOUISIANA, 
20101214024637.000|20101214024638.667|CCO|MISSOURI, TEXAS AND UTAH ALL 
20101214024638.667|20101214024640.333|CCO|HAVE THAT POLICY.
20101214024640.333|20101214024642.000|CCO|21 OTHER STATES HAVE THE 
20101214024642.000|20101214024644.000|CCO|AUTHORITY TO INSTITUTE THE 
20101214024644.000|20101214024646.000|CCO|POLICY, BUT THEY HAVEN'T.
20101214024646.000|20101214024648.000|CCO|THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT WOULD 
20101214024648.000|20101214024650.000|CCO|LIKE TO SEE ALL STATES ADOPT THE
